d.Value: Limited review due to snow/ice accumulation.
We recommend sealing at joints of different exterior sidings to prevent damages caused by water/humidity infiltration.

Loose/missing/cracked mortar noted.  Repair and/or repointing of the masonry joints is recommended to prevent damage/deterioration due to water/humidity infiltration. We recommend consulting a licensed mason for further evaluation and correction of this situation.
Deterioration noted.  We recommend repairs be performed to prevent further damages.
Damaged siding noted.  We recommend repairs be performed to prevent further damages.

Siding is too low in certain areas. Risk of water infiltration at the ventilation openings (weepholes) where present, and/or the joint between the foundation wall and the siding.  We recommend moving earth away from siding to allow for proper ventilation and to prevent premature deterioration of siding and/or its supporting structure, or possible damages due to water infiltration.
Detached siding noted. We recommend correcting this condition to prevent damages/deterioration to the structure.
Undulations/waves noted in vinyl siding. Possibly caused by inadequate installation. We recommend consulting a licensed contractor to further evaluate/correct this situation.
Flower boxes are integrated into the exterior siding. We often observe heavy damages due to such items. We recommend condemning and sealing them as a preventive measure.
Missing siding noted. We recommend correcting this condition to prevent damages/deterioration to the structure.
We recommend consulting a licensed contractor to further evaluate/correct this situation.
